div.head: 大小腸不通
div.div: large and small intestines are not passable

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: large and small intestines are not passable

sense.def: IS, Pathological Condition identical with da xiao bu tong 大小便不通 , stools and urine fail to pass. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry xuan ming fen 玄明粉 quotes Xian jing 仙經 : 五藏秘澀，大小腸不通 , “The five depots experience closure and roughness; large and small intestines are not passable ”.
